column2: "Ooh, nice killing out there. Oh, and I saw your report. A blood-soaked thing of beauty it is!"
"You really mastered the overwhelming power and widespread explosion of that grenade launcher!"
"Anyway, that weapon seems to fit your hands like a glove, so why don't you just keep it?"
"I'm completely satisfied with this report, so..."
"Keep up the good work with that grenade launcher, and make sure to torment lots and lots of hostiles before you kill them, okay?"
"You can now call Lisa as a partner."

"A new Client Order is available for Jozsef.

Jozsef can be found in the Gate Area, second floor."
